Philips Hue | C++/Mobile Developer | Eindhoven, The Netherlands | ONSITE, VISA, RELOCATION

Philips Hue is the worldâ€™s leading connected home lighting system. We're looking for C++ programmers to help develop the cross-platform library that powers the Hue apps for Android and iOS.
